document_data.caption: A map showing the Kuruk Muren within Khazari.
document_data.name: Kuruk Muren
document_data.mainbody: The '''Kuruk Muren''' was a river located in the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Geography: The Kuruk Muren originated in the [[Katakoro Shan]] range, flowing into [[Khazari]] along the [[Silk Road]] through [[Alashan]].
